doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Shalahuddin Qusar Biplob
doctor.specialty: Psychiatric Disorders, Sexual Problems & Drug Addiction Specialist
doctor.workplace: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Shalahuddin Qusar Biplob is a renowned Psychiatrist specializing in psychiatric disorders, sexual health issues, and drug addiction treatment. He holds an MBBS, an M.Phil in Psychiatry, and an MD in Psychiatry, with vast experience in mental health care. As a Professor and former Chairman of the Department of Psychiatry at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital, he has made significant contributions to the field of psychiatry in Bangladesh. Dr. Shalahuddin Qusar Biplob provides expert diagnosis and treatment for conditions such as depression, anxiety disorders, schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD), and substance abuse-related mental health issues. He consults at Moner Khabor For Care (MK4C), located at Navana Barek Carmela (Level 3), 11, Moghbazar Road, Dhaka. His visiting hours are from 5 PM to 10 PM, except on Fridays. For specialized psychiatric care, book an appointment with Dr. Shalahuddin Qusar Biplob today.

chamber.address: Navana Barek Carmela (Level 3), 11, Moghbazar Road, Dhaka
